name: lift-key
effect: Operates the elevator in the Celadon Rocket Hideout.
short_effect: Operates the elevator in Team Rocket’s Celadon Hideout.

flavor_text.emerald: An elevator key used in TEAM ROCKET’s HIDEOUT.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A key that operates the elevator in TEAM ROCKET’s HIDEOUT. It bears the TEAM ROCKET logo.
